price: (8) And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allāh and the Last Day," but they are not believers.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yaqūlu āmannā bil-lahi wabil-yawmi al-ākhiri wamā hum bimu'minīna
